title: A Home For You And Your Furry Friend Too
posting_body: ['The Highlands of Marin offers remarkable amenities, premier resident services and eco-friendly apartments in San Rafael.', 'From sweeping views of San Rafael to chic amenities at every turn, Highlands of Marin offers upscale apartment living near the best of Marin County and downtown San Francisco.', 'Enjoy generous community amenities like two swimming pools, a dog park, and 24-hour fitness center.', 'Experience a sunset from your private patio or curl up by the wood-burning fireplace in your apartment at the Highlands.', 'Take full advantage of a country getaway with all the conveniences of city living.', 'Visit our website: <URL> to view our availability and pricing, take a 3D Tour of this apartment or schedule your preference of a virtually guided or self-guided tour.', "We can't wait to show you what Highlands of Marin has in store as your new home!", 'From sweeping views of San Rafael to chic amenities at every turn, Highlands of Marin offers upscale apartment living near the best of Marin County and downtown San Francisco.', 'Enjoy generous community amenities like two swimming pools, a dog park, and 24-hour fitness center.', 'Experience a sunset from your private patio or curl up by the wood-burning fireplace in your apartment at the Highlands.', 'Take full advantage of a country getaway with all the conveniences of city living.', ' Explore available apartments at Highlands of Marin - now complete with the Smart Home package!', 'Highlands of Marin, managed by UDR', '1001 Cresta Way', 'San Rafael, CA 94903', 'show contact info', 'VIEW OUR WEBSITE:', '<URL>', 'Monday By Appointment Only', 'Tuesday', 'By Appointment', 'Only', 'Wednesday By Appointment Only', 'Thursday By Appointment Only', 'Friday By Appointment', 'Only', 'Saturday By Appointment Only', 'Apartment Features', '* Pre-wired for internet and cable', '* Granite Countertops', '* Washer and Dryer in unit', '* Ceiling Fan', '* Vertical Blinds', '* Central Heat and Air', '* Whirlpool Appliances', '* Stainless Steel Appliances', '* Refrigerator', '* Furnished or Unfurnished', '* Designer Track Lighting', '* Jacuzzi Tub', '* Furnished Options Available, Call for Pricing', '* Private Patio or Private Balcony (on select apartments)', '* Wood-Like Floors', '* Refrigerator, Microwave, Dishwasher & Electric Stove', '* Garden Tub', '* Linen Closet', '* Extra Storage', 'Community Features', '*', "Our prices can change daily, price listed is based on today's availability.", 'Call for details.', '* Garage Parking', '* Landscaped Courtyards', '* Bark Park', '* Non Smoking Community', '* Community Kitchen', '* Corporate Housing', '* Sun Deck', '* Hiking Trails', '* After-Hours Emergency Maintenance', '* Multi Function Study Rooms with Copier and Computers', '* TV Lounge', '* Smoke Free Community', '* Covered Parking', '* Swimming Pool', '* Easy Freeway Access', '* WiFi Access', '* EV Charging', '* Disability Access', '* Pet Salon', '* Outdoor Grill Area', '* Hiking and Biking Trails', '*', 'Special offers and pricing available to new leases only, not renewals, transfers or current residents', '* Community Lounge', '* Cardio Room', '* Playground', '* Fitness Studio', '* Spa', '* Extra Storage', '* We are a social community!', 'Find our Yelp, Facebook or Twitter page online.', '* Package Acceptance', '* Reserved Parking', '* Minutes from Restaurants, Shopping, and Much More', '* Guest Parking']
